head.script: var Summary = { displayimages: true, imagePosition: 'left', Widthimg: 0, Heightimg: 0, noThumb: 'https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-GRP8IcURRsw/T9MjiNWXUcI/AAAAAAAAB88/QEDpDHxI55o/s1600/no-thumb.jpg', SummaryWords: 13, wordsNoImg: 13, skipper: 0, DisplayHome: true, DisplayLabel: true };
